title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 19.6 - Solicitation of charitable donations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 19.6 - Solicitation of charitable donations

State Regulations

Direct solicitation of charitable donations from children in
the public schools on school property during regular school hours shall not be
permitted. The commissioner shall develop and disseminate guidelines on the
interpretation of this rule. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
19.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
